phases.name: Visual Polish & Theming
tasks: Fix all remaining color contrast issues using accessible theme tokens (no hardcoded hex values)
Polish light/dark mode support for all components and backgrounds
Audit and standardize all typography (font sizes, weights, line heights)
Ensure consistent spacing and layout using Tailwind and Material Design guidelines
Review and unify all shadcn UI components (buttons, cards, badges, alerts, etc.) for visual consistency
Standardize border radii, shadows, and elevation across all components
Polish hover, active, and disabled states for all interactive elements
Optimize and review all images and icons for clarity, cropping, and performance

phases.name: Performance & SEO
tasks: Optimize all images (compress, use AVIF/WebP where possible)
Add meta tags, Open Graph, and favicon for SEO/social sharing
Remove unused CSS/JS and dead code
Test on all major browsers and devices for responsiveness

phases.name: Final QA & Accessibility
tasks: Run Lighthouse and axe-core audits for accessibility and performance
Manual QA: keyboard navigation, screen reader, and color-blind checks
Check for any console errors or warnings in dev tools

phases.name: Deployment
tasks: Set up environment variables and production config (if needed)
Build and preview the production bundle
Deploy to preferred host (Vercel, Netlify, or server)
Verify live site and monitor for post-launch issues
